output.sentences: The family was ready for the parade, so they began to head out
They got great seats for the parade, right in a row in front of the crowd
Watching the parade, the parents loved to see the delight in their kids eyes
They waved at all of the floats and people in cars passing by
Their mom loved the hand made floats that people had worked on
